headline: Chipotle Balances Rumored Price Moves With AI Loyalty And Value Offers
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (NYSE:CMG) addressed rumors that it is planning targeted price increases for higher income customers, saying any future changes would be modest and tied to input costs. The company is rolling out value focused promotions, including $1 million in limited time freebies and new discount offers, to respond to softer consumer demand. Chipotle is updating its loyalty program with artificial intelligence and introducing new menu items to keep higher income guests engaged...

headline: McDonald's Q4 Earnings & Revenues Beat Estimates, Rise Y/Y
summary: MCD posts Q4 EPS and revenue beat as global comps rise year over year on strong U.S. and international momentum.

headline: Pershing Square buys Hertz, Amazon and Meta, exits Hilton and Nike
summary: In Pershing Square’s annual investor presentation, the firm announced new positions in Hertz (HTZ), Amazon.com (AMZN) and Meta Platforms (META). In 2025, Pershing said it exited positions in Chipotle (CMG), Canadian Pacific Kansas City (CP) and Nike (NKE). It exited Hilton (HLT) shares in 2026. headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Question
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
